action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings to improve user experience.
notes: Focus on customizing the landing page and inbox settings for efficiency.

action_item: Users & Roles - Uncheck the legacy search box to enhance patient search functionality.
notes: This allows for more precise searching by combining first name, last name, and gender.

action_item: Security - Change the main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Ensure to follow the straightforward process of changing the password in the settings tab.

action_item: Security - Change the eSignature ID for document signing security.
notes: Follow the two-step validation process to create a new eSignature ID.

action_item: Security - Update the visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate the eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize the CCDA template for clinical summaries.
notes: Select and arrange the sections of the patient's chart to be included in summaries.
